reviewText: Years ago a friend recommended this movie and lent me a VHS copy which I returned to him before I had a chance to view it. Barbara Bourbon and the three actresses who play her daughters may not be the greatest lookers, but they all give accomplished 'performances'. Film actually has a reasonable storyline and a reasonable standard of production. Made in 1975 the film features a lot of pubic/body hair, which gets the present day viewer wishing the cast had all had the benefit of thorough body waxing....!! Despite its vintage it stands up well and has been competently transferred to DVD format. Here in Europe it played perfectly in my multi-format DVD player. Entertaining. For its era I can see how it was considered something of a classic.
Old favorite.  Good quality considering age of film.  Prompt

Watched the other night, great fun at least they tried to have a plot and acting and it was very good for that time. If you like this sort of thing the movie is for you.  I watched it with friends and we laughed a lot. It was very entertaining
Love it!! Second time I purchased this movie, due to someone stealing my first copy.

Fuzzy footage great idea dominating and bulli bonking group of Mexican criteria minal escapees getting there sex after years in prison the women's bare asses on the horses is sexy the  mexican men are ugly dominating big muscular guys theme was erotic and rugged  not much western scenery or story we need a modern revamp. The pubic hair was typical of 70s.
My husband had been looking for the movie and he likes having it to add to his collection of dvds
Story line is okay.  The transfer to digital media was well done from a film put not shows the scratches and film defects as well.  Color and sound are done well.

Better than typical movie for its time. Actually has a plot of some sort. Not too raunchy. The good guys win in the end.
(but then, so did the bad guys)
